==== Notes ====

==== How to install fglrx ====

1) Open the terminal

2) Type : 
   <pre>
 sudo apt-get install xorg-driver-fglrx 
   </pre>

3) After installing, type : 
   <pre>
 gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf 
   </pre>

4) Go to the Section "Device" and replace the  '''"ati"'''  to  '''"fglrx"'''

5) Within the Section "Device", add a new line : 
   <pre>
 Option "MonitorLayout" "LVDS,AUTO" 
   </pre>

6) Full code for Section "Device" :
   <pre>
   Section "Device"
	Identifier	"ATI Technologies, Inc. Radeon Mobility M300 (M22)"
	Driver		"fglrx"
	BusID		"PCI:1:0:0"
        Option          "MonitorLayout"      "LVDS,AUTO" 
   EndSection
   </pre>

7) Save the file and reboot.

8) If it still doesn't work, type <code> sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg </code> and follows the instructions.
